detail_desc: Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Crocheted ballet pumps with a crocheted lace trim. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Calf-length dress in soft twill made from a linen and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, buttons down the front and pleats at the back of the waist. Flap front pockets with a button, long dolman sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable, adjustable belt at the waist with a fabric-covered buckle.
Double-layered hat in cotton jersey with a small appliqué at the hem.
Swim pants and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves, a small stand-up collar and wide flounce at the hem. Bottoms with a lined gusset. UPF 50.
Jersey top with an embroidered motif on the chest, short sleeves, visible seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses in plastic with tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved bodysuit in an organic cotton weave with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Ties at one side.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle with a shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.

Set with a pair of dungaree shorts in woven fabric and a T-shirt in slub cotton jersey. Dungaree shorts with patch front pockets, straps with adjustable buttoning, and embroidery and appliqués on the front. Buttons at the sides and concealed press-studs at the crotch. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short coat in soft, felted fabric with a shawl collar and a large, detachable faux fur collar. Concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in block-striped sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, opening with a button at the back of the neck and seam with a flounce at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in airy modal twill. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Loose, relaxed-fit legs with wide elastic at the hems.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and zipped side pockets. Detachable, elasticated belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.
Top in jersey crêpe with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back.
Leggings in imitation leather jersey with an elasticated waist.

Fabric changing bag with a matching, padded changing mat. Bag with two handles, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and a detachable hook and loop fastening at the top so the bag can easily be attached to the handle of a pushchair. One outer compartment and three inner compartments. Lined. Matching, folding changing mat that fastens with a button. Size of bag 13x28x38 cm. Size of mat 35x60 cm.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Two-button blazer in cotton seersucker with fake flap welt pockets at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent.
Sandals with a zip at the back and strap around the ankle. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels approx. 8.5 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Sailor dress in soft cotton jersey. Sailor collar with a decorative tie detail at the front, short sleeves and contrasting colour details.
Metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a padlock. Adjustable length 46-53 cm.

Short cotton twill shorts with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, slightly lower crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with short slits in the sides.
Cardigan in a soft, fine cotton knit with buttons down the front and scalloped edges.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and deep, raw-edge armholes.
Short, wide dress in patterned satin with buttons on one shoulder and a pleated yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.

Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is recycled.

Padded parka in cotton canvas with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, chest and side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
High-waisted, fitted skirt.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative seam at the front and metal buckle at the top. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 1.8 cm.
Long cardigan in supersoft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a brushed finish. Long sleeves and no buttons.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend containing some cashmere.

Six ear cuffs in various designs. Two with pearly plastic beads, two in metal decorated with plastic beads and two in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones. Can be worn on non-pierced ears. Size 1.3 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit containing some wool with a wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather trainers with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and contrasting colour heel caps. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Off-the-shoulder top in textured jersey with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the hem.
Short shorts in Tencel™ lyocell with an elasticated drawstring waist and back pockets.
Gently tailored coat in faux fur, with a stand-up collar, concealed press-studs at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Slightly longer blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Yoke with a pleat at the back for added width and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Leggings in soft velour with covered elastication at the waist and flared legs.
Knee-length lace dress with mesh sections at the top and on the sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist. Half-lined.
Metal hair clips, four in a solid colour, four glittery and two patterned. Length 4 cm.

Short, double-breasted trenchcoat in a sturdy cotton weave with a collar with a hook-and-eye fastening and loose yoke with a button front and back. Side pockets, two inner pockets with a button, a tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, hood, front pockets and a contrasting colour zip down the front with a chin guard.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top and tapered legs with creases. A zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

prod_name: B Dk and Stormy Embroidery Top
detail_desc: Cropped, sleeveless top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Deep V-neck front and back, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders. Narrow ties at the back to keep the top in place and wide ties at the hem.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and fluted rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in cotton-blend waffled jersey with patches, raw hems and a seam centre back. Rounded hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Short, sleeveless, nursing dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Wide-fitting jumper in a soft, hole-patterned knit with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.

Long, sleeveless dress in sturdy satin with a deep V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side, a seam at the waist and a flared, segmented skirt. Satin lining.
